content:
Duplex Enum

Definition

Specifies the printer's duplex setting.

In this Article

public enum Duplex
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
Duplex

Remarks

This enumeration is used by the PrinterSettings class.

For more information on printing, see the System.Drawing.Printing namespace overview.

Fields

Default

The printer's default duplex setting.
Horizontal

Double-sided, horizontal printing.
Simplex

Single-sided printing.
Vertical

Double-sided, vertical printing.
